data.name: BrokerQueueExhausted
data.value: Messages in broker queue are exhausted. Notification service will go into sleep mode for : {0} ms.

data.name: ExceptionAddingBrokerMessageToQueue
data.value: An exception occurred while trying to add the broker message to internal queue.

data.name: ExceptionCallingStoredProcedure
data.value: An exception occured while calling stored procedure \"Core.FetchMessage\". Please check the exception details for more information.

data.name: ExceptionCreatingPublishingServiceProxy
data.value: An exception occured while creating the publishing service proxy. Please check the exception details for more information.

data.name: ExceptionInWorkerThread
data.value: An exception occured in the worker thread of Worker class. Please check the exception details for more information.

data.name: ExceptionParsingMessage
data.value: An exception was thrown while message parsing. Please check the exception details for more information.

data.name: ExceptionPushingMessage
data.value: An exception was thrown while pushing message. ResourceChangeMessage count : {0}

data.name: ExceptionThrownByPublishingService
data.value: An exception was thrown by the publishing service. Please check the exception details for more information.\nNotification service will retry in {0} minutes.

data.name: FetchedMessagesFromSqlBroker
data.value: Fetched messages from SQL Broker queue.

data.name: FetchingMessagesFromSqlBrokerQueue
data.value: Fetching messages from SQL Broker queue. Query : {0}

data.name: MessagesSentToPublishingService
data.value: Messages sent to publishing service. Resource Type : {0}. Message Count : {1}

data.name: ParsedMessageInInternalQueue
data.value: Parsed the message from the internal queue to processed message list. ResourceChangeMessage added : {0}

data.name: ParsingMessageInInternalQueue
data.value: Parsing the message from internal queue. Raw Messages in Queue : {0}

data.name: PublishingServiceBusyGoingToSleep
data.value: Publishing Service is busy. Notification service will go into sleep mode for : {0} seconds.

data.name: PublishingServiceBusyMessagesWillNotBeSent
data.value: Publishing Service is busy processing collection for \'{0}\'. Messages for this resource type will not be sent to publishing service.

data.name: PublishingServiceEndpointUnavailableAfterTimeout
data.value: The publishing service host endpoint was unavailable. Timeout period has expired.

data.name: PublishingServiceEndpointUnavailableWithSuggestion
data.value: The publishing service host endpoint was unavailable. Please check if the publishing service is started and the enpoint address is correct.\nNotification service will retry in {0} minutes.

data.name: PushedMessagesFromProcessedListToPublishingService
data.value: Pushed messages from processed message list to publishing service.

data.name: PushingMessagesFromProcessedListToPublishingService
data.value: Pushing all messages from processed message list to publishing service. ResourceChangeMessage count : {0}

data.name: ReceivedMessagesFromSqlBrokerQueue
data.value: Received message from SQL Broker queue : Message Length (bytes) : {0}
